actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1662(c) of title 38, United States Code, to extend the delimiting period for certain veterans pursuing a course of farm cooperative training.

summary.text: Extends to August 31, 1980, the delimiting period for veterans pursuing a course of farm cooperative training. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1662(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1662(c) of title 38, United States Code, to extend the delimiting period for certain veterans pursuing a course of farm cooperative training.
